name: Strange Dungeon (Kak's)
description:
Game Description

In the small game Strange Dungeon, you are imprisoned in a dungeon. You notice that there are rails and traps that fire swords every time the light is turned on.  It's mysterious that the trains don't run on tracks and that swords come out of a flag.

Rules

You have to dodge the trains and the swords each time the light is switched on.

Controls

Arrows : Move

Credits Assets
  • Sprites & tiles by Kenney.
Sound
  • Music by Samuelbcf7.
  • SFX by 16FPanskaLan_Jiri, AtoMediaDesign.
Font
  • Pixel font by Kenney.
